product_name: AGS Stainless-Steel Carabiner Travel Mug - Overstock
long_description: With a quick-clip carabiner handle, the AGS Stainless-Steel Carabiner Tavel Mug goes anywhere you do and keeps 14 fl. oz. of your favorite beverage warm with double walls and a spill reducing lid. Fits in most car cup holders. Overstock.
short_description: With a quick-clip carabiner handle, the AGS Stainless-Steel Carabiner Tavel Mug goes anywhere you do and keeps 14 fl. oz. of your favorite beverage warm with double walls and a spill reducing lid.
